name: Cube Run (DarkMouse Studios)
description:
Cube Run was made as a as part of a learning process for myself.  Following a BlackThornProd Tutorial video and then trying to remake the project myself without any reference. It's really minimal and I would like to expand on it more and eventually release it to Android. Thank you for any and all feedback and thank you for playing! :D

BlackThornProd YT: He is a great teacher for new game devs.  www.youtube.com/blackthornprod
